transArray.content:
Advantage:
1. The location is very good. After staying for a few nights, it is very convenient to go everywhere, including going to the airport. Sanyuan Bridge may be the most suitable place to stay when traveling to Beijing for the first time. We didnâ€™t take a taxi for a few days in Beijing. The basic subway Shared bicycles can cover
2. There is self-service laundry and drying in the hall

Disadvantages:
1. Just like what other guests commented, the communication method, service awareness and concept need to be improved. Unlike professional hotel practitioners, I will avoid dealing with the staff in the future.
2. The interior of the room is cramped and claustrophobic. It is suitable for sleeping and not suitable for long stay

Generally speaking, I will consider this store next time I come to Beijing
